abstract: The company didn’t appear to get the hint that the Justice Department wasn’t satisfied with either the speed or the scope of potential remedies.
snippet: The company didn’t appear to get the hint that the Justice Department wasn’t satisfied with either the speed or the scope of potential remedies.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department’s lawsuit to block AT&T‘s $39 billion takeover of T-Mobile USA took the company by surprise. But depending on whom you ask, it shouldn’t have.

headline.main: How AT&T Got to a Standoff With the Government

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
